suspend-on-double-click.tooltip: When enabled, a double-click will suspend the computer, otherwise the computer will suspend on a single click.

count-down.description: Use a count down before suspending
count-down.tooltip:
When enabled, a count down will occurs before suspending the computer.
Clicking again during the count down will cancel the suspend.

fullcolor-icon.tooltip: When enabled, a full color panel icon will be used, otherwise a symbolic icon sill be used.
